name: Talk_Civ2
_source: speak;Man1;Were you able to knock down that snag?|Hope that tool was able to knock it down.
speak;Eirika;Thank you, though it is a little perplexing to try to knock down a snag with a warhammer...
speak;Man1;What do you mean?|Just give it a good whack and knock it clear down!
speak;Eirika;I suppose, but a warhammer is a litte bit too much for me right now...

speak;Man1;Hmmmm....|You might have a point there...|Well, give to someone big then!|Ha ha ha!|I had a buddy who used to be a <red>Pirate</> that could use it well!|He also had a buddy who rode <red>dragons</> that could use it well too!
speak;Eirika;I will probably do that for now.|Maybe someday I can use it, but not right now.
